SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g9.model.database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.model.database.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class is a facade that provides a simplified interface to a flashcard database. This class uses the Facade design pattern to provide a single point of entry for accessing the database, hiding the underlying complexity of the database from the client code. The Database class is implemented using the Singleton design pattern, ensuring that only a single instance of the class exists at any given time.

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String nickname) throws DatabaseException
      Method used to delete an existing User from the database.
      Parameters:
      nickname - is used to find the user in the database using a sql query.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if the deletion fails or a sql exceptions occurs

      newPassword - is used to change the existing password of the user with it.
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - the password update fails or a sql exception eccurs
